QUESTION_TXT: BWC has acquired a product called Targeted Messaging System (TMS). This tool will integrate with key business processes and systems to deliver real-time notifications to individual customers via email and text messaging. BWC currently sends e-mails to employers who have opted in to receive policy invoice notices and to injured workers for compensation payment notifications.
Please identify how important the following topics would be to the injured worker if they were included in the Targeted Messaging System.
